name: The Jester Saves The World ?!
description:
The demons are attacking yet again!
The knight broke his sword, who can save the world now?

The King?  Too lazy.
The princess? Currently kidnapped.
The Jester ? Ahah, as if...

...

Wait, really ?


The Jester

Take control of the Jester in this short but crazy quest to save the world.

He sure can jump, but asides from that...

And he decides to fool around on the job?  Leaving his fighting skills determined by Lady Luck?

What it really a good idea to let him save the world?

Controls

Left and Right Arrow Keys - Move

Up Arrow Key - Jump

Space/Enter - Confirm

F - Fullscreen

Luck

Every 10 seconds, a random event wil interfere with your journey.

WIND - A strong blow of wind pushes you to the left (and it's annoying).

SLIPPERY - Your feet aren't that reliable anymore.

MOMENTUM - You jumped too far. Oops.

SPATIAL - You're in space now! Cool! Slow but cool!

POGO - Boing boing.

Also including heart-dices that randomly change your maximum health (possibily reduce it) and dices that roll when you kill an enemy that might give you a heart (maybe).

Made for the Game Maker's Tool Kit Game Jam 2022 using Game Maker Studio 2. Theme: Roll of the Dice

Music:

64 Sundays by Twin Musicom
http://www.twinmusicom.org/

Lucidity by Soft and Furious
